summary: ICP starter app scaffolded with a Motoko backend canister and a React+Vite+Tailwind frontend, including Internet Identity authentication, shadcn/ui component library setup, generated login assets, and additional example pages (Calculate, Comments, Google Map, Profile) within the frontend routing.
architectural_notes: Architecture split into Motoko backend canister + React/Vite frontend; frontend interacts via generated declarations (backend.did.*) and actor hooks.
Authentication uses Internet Identity; frontend maintains authenticated vs unauthenticated routing/pages (LoginPage, AuthedLandingPage).
UI layer is based on Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui components, with custom ESLint rules to enforce project constraints.
Build/deploy scaffolding includes an ICP-oriented build template (Dockerfile, deploy.sh, canister.yaml) plus scripts to resize/prune generated images.
Frontend includes a public HomePage in addition to LoginPage and AuthedLandingPage, with routing updated accordingly.
Frontend adds a StorageClient abstraction for client-side persistence (e.g., localStorage/session storage access).
Frontend routing/page set expanded beyond initial Home/Login/AuthedLanding to include additional example pages (Calculate, Comments, Google Map, Profile).

Frontend includes bundled geography datasets and a ContinentalMap UI component, along with a generated labeled world map image asset, to support map/geo visualizations without relying solely on external map providers.

generatedImages.description: Generated labeled world map image asset for map/geo UI

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold
existing_features.description: Backend canister implemented in Motoko with corresponding Candid/interface declarations wired into the frontend.

existing_features.title: React + Vite + Tailwind frontend scaffold
existing_features.description: Frontend application bootstrapped with React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and project-level configuration (tsconfig, eslint, vite config).

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication flow
existing_features.description: Login page and authenticated landing page wired with Internet Identity provider integration and actor hook/utilities.

existing_features.title: shadcn/ui component library integrated
existing_features.description: shadcn/ui component set added to the frontend (component registry/config and multiple UI primitives).

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template and scripts for ICP
existing_features.description: Build template added including Dockerfile, deploy script, ICP canister yaml configs, workspace/package management, and image processing scripts.

existing_features.title: Generated login page assets
existing_features.description: Generated and included login background and logo assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.

existing_features.title: Public Home page and refined frontend routing
existing_features.description: Frontend now includes a public HomePage and updated routing structure across HomePage, LoginPage, and AuthedLandingPage.

existing_features.title: Client-side storage utility abstraction
existing_features.description: Added a StorageClient utility to centralize client-side persistence/access patterns used by the frontend.

existing_features.title: Additional themed login assets (baby-blue)
existing_features.description: Added alternate baby-blue variants of the generated login background and logo assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.

existing_features.title: Additional example pages in frontend (Calculate, Comments, Google Map, Profile)
existing_features.description: Frontend now includes additional pages beyond Home/Login/AuthedLanding (e.g., CalculatePage, CommentPage, GoogleMapPage, ProfilePage) intended as example screens/routes within the app.

existing_features.title: Continental/world map visualization component and datasets
existing_features.description: Frontend includes a ContinentalMap component backed by bundled geography datasets (continents/countries-states/seas-oceans/environment) and a generated labeled world map image asset for map-focused UI/screens.

existing_features.title: Update the Home page UI to use a professional underwater theme (colors, gradients, typography, and section styling) consistent with the existing ocean-themed design tokens, while keeping the existing top navigation behavior intact.

Add a bottom section on the Home page containing 3 boxes side-by-side (responsive) with the exact feature titles, descriptions, and CTA labels provided by the user; each CTA must navigate to the appropriate existing page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Redesign HomePage with a professional underwater theme
Add a 3-column feature section at bottom of HomePage with boxes for Interactive Map (Explore Map CTA), Coral Reef Health Index (Calculate Index CTA), and Comments (CTA/details TBD)

projectName: Redesign Home page with professional underwater theme and 3 feature boxes with CTAs
